synopsis.text: Be a part of the thrilling journey of Tsubasa Sumisora, a rookie A&R manager at the illustrious Gandala Music, as she takes charge of the idol unit 'B-PROJECT' in the anime "B-Project." With three distinct idol groups - Kitakore, THRIVE, and MooNs - under her wing, Tsubasa faces various challenges and mishaps as she navigates her first job. Despite her inexperience, she brings a unique skill set to the table, including a keen ear for sound and an intuitive approach to management. Embark on this exciting adventure with Tsubasa and the ten diverse, talented boys as they strive for success in the cutthroat world of music.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
